results.definition: be afraid or feel anxious or apprehensive about a possible or probable situation or event
examples: I fear she might get aggressive

results.definition: be afraid or scared of; be frightened of
examples: I fear the winters in Moscow
We should not fear the Communists!

results.definition: be sorry; used to introduce an unpleasant statement
examples: I fear I won't make it to your wedding party
I fear the results of the final exams

results.definition: regard with feelings of respect and reverence; consider hallowed or exalted or be in awe of
